channel.title: Finding a source
channel.description: I'm having trouble finding a good source.. I loved hyperion but then saw you needed eclipse to use it -.-.. I currently have pkplanet, it's a great source but I don't like it as much anymore.. I need a more stable source will Most skills working (even better if all of them) and lots of things to do so people won't get bored on my server.. If you have any suggestions please post them or add me on msn - Splinter-x@hotmail.com. Thanks!

item.title: Finding a source
item.dc:creator: @splinter-x splinter-x
item.description:
@splinter-x wrote:

Good economy and pking… I love pking but I like having both so that people will be skilling and pking… I’m looking for something like hyperion with nothing custom or anything just all skills working and log in screen is great… I really wish hyperion would be just like a regular 317 that I can edit… That would be great :]

Read full topic

item.title: Finding a source
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

i though pk planet was great, im running that and edited it A LOT. Are you looking for something for pking, good economy or both?

Read full topic

item.title: Finding a source

item.description:
@splinter-x wrote:

I’m having trouble finding a good source… I loved hyperion but then saw you needed eclipse to use it -.-… I currently have pkplanet, it’s a great source but I don’t like it as much anymore… I need a more stable source will Most skills working (even better if all of them) and lots of things to do so people won’t get bored on my server… If you have any suggestions please post them or add me on msn - Splinter-x@hotmail.com. Thanks!
